Totum

Totum is a non-magical Creation with many parallels to the magical Creation of Marlien.

For more information on Totum, see its own wiki, or browse below for specialist topics.

Relation of Totum and Marlien

The creations of Totum and Marlien bear a number of similarities including their order of dimensionality (three dimensions), and the variety of floara, fauna, natural phenomenon, and physics within.
